segments.text: I notice the boy stretching up to grab cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling, and he doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get in so much trouble if that woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, and they’re just focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how brave—or stupid—they’re being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like she’s been waiting for this moment all day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on one foot, and the stool is about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to regret this when they both end up on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
